mainText:
Im from Argentina, and in university, Steve is always there, teachers 
and professors are always talking about him, he was awesome. I also like my Apple stuff so much, my MacBook Air, my iPhone, my iPad 
2, they have changed my life, and the lives of million of people around 
the world. I will miss him so much, he always knew what to say. You cant imagine 
how sad people are in South America too. RIP Steve, I just hope you can still lead Apple from wherever you are 
now.

"Stay hungry, Stay foolish"
author: Ornella
